trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class representing a field or a property to be extracted from a workflow instance and its associated annotations.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] TrackingExtract is the `abstract` base class from which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> class and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> class are derived.

An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> specifies a field or a property to be extracted from the activity associated with a tracking event and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> specifies a field or a property to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow instance.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract"></xref> class.
When implemented in a derived class, gets the annotations associated with the extracted data.
Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information to associate with the extracted data.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> associated with the extracted data.
When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the field or property to be extracted.

Member can be set to specify a field or a property; a member of a field or a property; or a single element of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
For example, a single element in an `array` may be specified.
The dot delineated name of a field or a property.
